list.name: Default
list.comment:
switch to a streamlined selection strategy (remove orchestrating 'LiveTrainTimesActivity')
not very easy to use right now, but we'll get there.

task.summary: allow 'Anywhere!' from A-Z and favourite views
Rename an activity, as it is actually a fragment
add rudimentary search tab for station selection

Allow selection of favourites.
Some problems remain: the on click listening per station is slow, hard to decipher as a user, and occasionally flat out doesn't work switching between from and to stations is very odd (tab transitions) detecting when a journey is being queried is impossible

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE

MESSAGE.value: move to a tabbed selector activity and add feature to remove a selected station

attempt to handle transitions a bit better by giving a clue about what's already selected
